item.title: How Do I Change This Command To A Staff Only Command?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_Own_U Clawz Own U
item.description:
@Clawz_Own_U wrote:

How Do I Change This Command To A Staff Only Command?

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)) {
Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(2646,9383, 0));
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
"<col=00ff00>Welcome To Staff Zone, "+player.getDisplayName());
return true;
}
